addr: 1300 North Wilton Place Los Angeles, CA 90028
title: Writer's Room - Night
desc: The Writers Room is perfect for any TCD member who needs help with writing their scripts for filming week. Bounce ideas off other actors/writers and get to know those you'll be filming with.? To attend the Writers room you MUST bring two copies of a script. No exceptions. If you're not confident about your script, this is the perfect place to workshop your material! We'll help you fine tune that script so it's ready for filming!
